byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Amer Red Cross distributes food and clothing
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 1--Week end contributions brought the American Red Cross War Relief Fund almost to within $3,000,000 of the $20,000,000 goal which has been fixed....

headline.main: WAR RELIEF FUND NEARS $17,000,000; $5,000 Is Given Red Cross in Memory of Martin Roberts of Library of Congress CHILD SENDS POEM AND $2 Philippines Chapter Reports Readiness to Care for 1,100 Refugees From Hong Kong

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 1--Week end contributions brought the American Red Cross War Relief Fund almost to within $3,000,000 of the $20,000,000 goal which has been fixed.
